rag.title: Knowledge Base
rag.desc: Here, you can configure knowledge base related settings, knowledge base based on RAG technology, through embedding models to convert text into vectors, then through vector search to achieve intelligent search and intelligent answers.
rag.settingsDesc: By adjusting parameters, you can more precisely control the retrieval effect of the knowledge base.
rag.deleteVectorConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear the knowledge base?
rag.enableDesc: Enabling it will make AI search your notes when answering questions, providing more accurate answers.
rag.chunkSizeDesc: The maximum number of characters for text chunking. Larger chunks may contain more context, but will increase vector calculation complexity.
rag.chunkOverlapDesc: The number of overlapping characters between text chunks. Larger overlaps can maintain context continuity.
rag.resultCountDesc: The number of related documents returned when searching. The more documents, the more information provided, but may also introduce noise.
rag.similarityThresholdDesc: The minimum similarity threshold between documents and queries. Only documents exceeding this threshold will be returned. The value range is 0.0-1.0, the higher the threshold, the stricter the requirement.

editor.title: Markdown Editor
editor.desc: Here, you can customize the Markdown editor, creating a writing experience tailored to your needs.
editor.typewriterModeDesc: In typewriter mode, the editor will simulate a typewriter effect, helping you better immerse in writing.

uploadStore.uploadConfirm: Upload configuration please ensure the sync repository is private, otherwise the data will be leaked!
uploadStore.downloadConfirm: Download configuration will cover local configuration and restart to take effect!

about.title: About
about.desc: A note-taking assistant focused on record and writing.

defaultModel.title: Default Model
defaultModel.desc: Here, you can use different models for different scenes, to improve efficiency and reduce costs.
defaultModel.placeholder: Please select or search for models

primaryModel.title: Main model
primaryModel.desc: As the main model for all scenarios, this model is used if other dialogue models do not select the default model.

markDesc.title: Record Description
markDesc.desc: Used to process records after OCR recognition, generating record descriptions.

placeholder.title: AI Suggestion
placeholder.desc: AI suggestion prompts are used for content generation in the placeholder of the record page AI conversation.

embedding.title: Embedding Model
embedding.desc: Used for text embedding and vectorization scenarios.

reranking.title: Reranking Model
reranking.desc: Used for reordering and optimizing search results.

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.desc: Here, you can add and manage prompts, helping AI better understand your needs.
prompt.addPromptDesc: Please enter the prompt name and content, helping AI better understand your needs.

sync.title: Sync
sync.desc: Here, you can configure the synchronization repository, which can help you synchronize records, markdown files, system configurations and other information.
sync.imageRepoDesc: Sync your images to repository, using jsdelivr for acceleration
sync.newTokenDesc: When creating a new token, please make sure to check the repo permission, and after configuration, it will automatically create a file repository (private) and an image repository.
sync.giteeTokenDesc: Gitee personal access token is used for data synchronization. It needs repository read and write permissions. After configuration, it will automatically create a file repository (private) and an image repository.
sync.imageRepoSettingDesc: You have already configured an image repository, you can choose to use the image repository or use local storage.
sync.jsdelivrSettingDesc: Use jsdelivr to speed up image access.
sync.giteeAutoSyncDesc: When enabled, the editor will automatically sync to Gitee 10 seconds after input stops
sync.backupMethodDesc: After setting as the primary backup method, all sync-related functions in writing will use the current backup method (except for image hosting)

imageHosting.title: Image Hosting
imageHosting.desc: Here, you can configure image hosting, uploading images to the image hosting service.

backupSync.title: Backup Data
backupSync.desc: Here, you can use other methods to backup your data, you can regularly backup to ensure data security.

webdav.description: WebDAV is only used as a backup solution and does not support auto-sync, history rollback, and other features.
webdav.serverUrlDesc: Enter the URL of the WebDAV server, e.g: https://dav.example.com
webdav.backupPathDesc: Backup path on the WebDAV server, e.g: /backup/notes
webdav.syncSuccessDesc: Synced {count} files from WebDAV to local.

template.title: Template
template.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete this template?
template.name: Name
template.addTemplateDesc: Please enter the custom template name and content, helping AI better understand your needs.

dev.title: Developer
dev.clearDataConfirm: Are you sure to clear data?
dev.proxy: Proxy, used to solve network problems, after configuration, it is recommended to restart the application.

ai.title: Model Management
ai.desc: Here, you can add and manage various custom model services. After configuration, you will unlock AI-related features, such as organization and conversation functions.
ai.modelConfigDesc: Every configuration corresponds to an AI model, you can create new configurations through templates or custom.
ai.createDesc: Select an empty configuration or create a new configuration using the supplier template.
ai.deleteCustomModelConfirm: Are you sure to delete this custom model?
ai.modelSupport: Only supports AI models with OpenAI protocol

modelType.title: Model Type
modelType.desc: Select the type of AI model based on its capability

error.title: Failed to get model list
error.description: Please check if API Key or network is correct

ai.modelProviderDesc: Custom models only support AI models with OpenAI protocol.
ai.modelTitleDesc: Custom name, used to identify AI models, please do not repeat.
ai.modelBaseUrlDesc: You only need to configure the version number, for example: https://api.openai.com/v1, the suffix will be automatically added.
ai.modelDesc: Some models support getting model list, if not supported please manually configure.
ai.temperatureDesc: Controls randomness of output. Lower values make generated content more deterministic.
ai.topPDesc: A nucleus sampling method, where the model considers the results of tokens with top_p probability mass. So 0.1 means only consider the top 10% probability mass. Usually we suggest to change this or temperature but not both.

file.title: File Settings
file.desc: Here, you can manage workspace settings and other file-related options.

workspace.title: Workspace Settings
workspace.desc: Set the application's workspace directory where files will be saved

info.title: Workspace Information
info.desc: After changing the workspace, you need to restart the application for the changes to take full effect. Files in the new workspace will be displayed after restart.

toast.errorDesc: Unable to select workspace directory, please try again
toast.resetErrorDesc: Unable to reset to default workspace, please try again

assets.title: Assets Path
assets.desc: Set the path where resources (e.g. images, videos, files etc.) used in writing will be saved. Resources will be saved at the same level as the currently edited markdown file.
assets.select: Set the path where resources used in writing will be saved

trash.title: Empty Trash
trash.confirm: Are you sure to empty the trash?

progress.newTokenDesc: New token must be configured with repo permission, configuration will automatically create file repository (private) and image repository.

text.title: Record Text
text.description: Record a piece of text, which will be inserted into the appropriate position when organizing notes.

link.title: Record Link
link.description: Enter a webpage link, and the system will automatically crawl the page content and save it

placeholder.default: Ask questions or organize your notes into an article...
placeholder.noApiKey: API Key not configured, AI chat feature is unavailable...

features.organize: Organize your health records into notes

content.organize: Organize your records into an article:

note.description: The current note is generated by AI and cannot be edited. Convert the current note to an article (generate a local file) for secondary creation in the writing page.
note.deleteTag: Delete current tag, records and notes (can be restored from trash)
note.warning: After conversion, you will be redirected to the writing page.

text.title: Record Text
text.description: Record a piece of text, which will be inserted into the appropriate position when organizing notes.

features.organize: Organize your health records into notes

chat.confirmNewDescription: Are you sure you want to create a new tag to start a conversation?
chat.confirmRemoveDescription: Please note that deleting this tag will also delete all records within it. Please confirm again.

content.organize: Organize your records into an article:

note.description: The current note is generated by AI and cannot be edited. Convert the current note to an article (generate a local file) for secondary creation in the writing page.
note.deleteTag: Delete current tag, records and notes (can be restored from trash)
note.warning: After conversion, you will be redirected to the writing page.

placeholder.noApiKey: No API Key configured, can't use AI chat...
placeholder.noPrimaryModel: No primary model configured, can't use AI chat...

control.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete this message?

tag.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete this tag?

noData.title: Sync feature not enabled
noData.desc: Please go to the system settings page to configure Github sync.

clipboard.confirmOverwrite: File already exists, do you want to overwrite it?

file.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this file?

mark.title: Records
mark.description: Convert records into content to insert into the article.
mark.ocrNoContent: OCR did not recognize any content

question.promptTemplate:
Reference text: {content}
Based on the question: {question}, directly provide the answer content.

continue.promptTemplate:
Based on the preceding text: "{content}" continue writing and return content not exceeding 100 words.
You can reference the following text: "{endContent}", but avoid duplicating its content.

polish.promptTemplate: Polish this text: {content}, keep the language unchanged, fix typos and grammatical errors, directly return the polished result.

eraser.promptTemplate: Simplify this text: {content}, this text is too verbose, reduce the word count by at least half, keep the language unchanged, directly return the optimized result.

translation.promptTemplate: Translate this text: {content}, into {language}, directly return the translated result.

sync.checkNetworkOrToken: Please check network connection or GitHub token
